body_html: Whats most frustrating is that if one token is 50 characters long and 10 other tokens in that batch are 3 characters long it essentially takes the same time to process as if every token was 50 characters long. There must be a better way to approach this.
body_text: Whats most frustrating is that if one token is 50 characters long and 10 other tokens in that batch are 3 characters long it essentially takes the same time to process as if every token was 50 characters long. There must be a better way to approach this.
body: Whats most frustrating is that if one token is 50 characters long and 10 other tokens in that batch are 3 characters long it essentially takes the same time to process as if every token was 50 characters long. There must be a better way to approach this.
